Class BinaryTree<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • BinaryTree<R>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinarySearchTree

    public class BinaryTree<R>
extends java.lang.Object
    BinaryTree class for the CSE222 - Data Structures and Algorithms course on Gebze Technical University. This class written with the help of Wolfgang & Koffman's Data Structures and Algorithms Using Java book to learn internal of binary trees and use whenever needed on homeworks
    Author:
    Deniz Can Erdem YÄ±lmaz 30.04.2017

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BinaryTree()
      No parametered constructor Initializes an empty tree
      BinaryTree(BinaryTree.Node<R> rootNode)
      Node type parametered constructor Initializes tree with root node
      BinaryTree(R item, BinaryTree<R> left, BinaryTree<R> right)
      R and BinaryTree type parametered constructor Initializes a tree with given item at root and other two trees on left and right attributes
